Latest Features

  • Leisure & Culture Dundee's Holiday Activities 2019 Book Now! Get active. Have fun.

  • North East By Election Following the sad passing of Councillor Brian Gordon, a By-election will be held on Thurs 2nd May

  • Dundee Schools Annual Spring Concerts Two evenings of stunning concerts as young musicians from across Dundee come together to make music in spectacular surroundings

  • Review of Polling Districts & Polling Places Comment on proposals that may affect a polling station in your area.

  • RYA Get on Board Family Sessions Come and enjoy a family adventure setting off & returning to Dundee Sailing Club

  • Paperless Council Tax Billing Sign up before 1st April 2019 and you could win your Council Tax paid for a year
